page.title: 10Colehill Fun Run
page.content: On Sunday, l9th May, l985, about one hundred people went to Cannon Hill Woods to join in the Fun Run. Some of them were going to run five miles and some were going to run ten miles. My mum and uncle ran ten miles. They all started in the woods and it took about ten minutes to do one lap. A week or so before the run everyone had a racing pack which held their number and a plan of the route. Some wore track suits and others wore shorts and vests. Everyone had a number. The run was started by someone shouting "Go" through a loudspeaker. The winner was the person with the most sponsors, but everyone got a sew-on badge. All the money went to "Save the Children Fund". People were watching all around the course, and I enjoyed it very much. {(MARC WHITLOCK) AGED 9 years.
